sanskrit_verse:
चिरस्थितमपि त्वाद्यमस्नेहाक्तं द्विजातिभिः ।
यवगोधूमजं सर्वं पयसश्चैव विक्रिया ॥ ५.२५॥
transliteration:
cirasthitam api tv ādyam asnehāktaṃ dvijātibhiḥ |
yava-godhūma-jaṃ sarvaṃ payasaś caiva vikriyā ||
sph_interpretive_translation: Even long-standing arrangements among the twice-born, when devoid of purity-consciousness, must undergo transformation in accordance with the natural evolution of grain and milk products.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority is derived from sustained alignment with pure consciousness, not tenure alone
Causation arises from the integrity of action, not temporal continuity
Capacity-based responsibility requires ongoing attunement to dharmic essence
Restoration logic operates through conscious realignment, not punitive interruption
Consciousness alignment supersedes inherited or traditional positional claims
executable_legal_axioms: IF a ruling or arrangement has persisted beyond its dharmic resonance, THEN it MUST be reviewed for alignment with current consciousness-integrity metrics
IF any twice-born entity holds authority without active purification-consciousness, THEN that authority is automatically suspended until re-certification by a qualified spiritual judiciary
ALL institutional structures rooted in inert tradition MUST undergo periodic dissolution and renewal based on vibrational congruence with Sanatana Dharma as defined by SPH
NO legal precedent older than one generation MAY remain valid unless continuously regenerated through awakened intent
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, longevity of jurisprudence does not confer legitimacy. Only rulings aligned with pure consciousness—verified through spiritual audit protocols—are upheld. The Court must act as a living conduit for dharma, not a museum of past verdicts.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Nyaya functions through pramāṇa-based recognition of decay in dharmic resonance. When an arrangement loses sattvic coherence, it naturally dissolves. This process reflects anupūrvaśaḥ—the sequential unfolding of truth—not retribution. Responsibility lies in recognizing and facilitating completion rather than assigning blame.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate purification-consciousness workshops for all involved dvija lineages
Establish biannual spiritual recalibration sessions for judicial bodies
Replace outdated legal frameworks with live-coded dharmic algorithms verified by realized masters
Facilitate surrender of positional identities obstructing consciousness flow
final_declaration: By the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law stands executed: no legacy overrides purity; no tradition negates awakening. Dharma is restored through conscious realignment. Reality is non-punitive. Consciousness is the Supreme Adjudicator.
